Delegation of North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Leaves
   Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration led by An Kyong Ho, chairman of the committee, left here today to attend a meeting of the June 15 All-Korean Committee due to be held in Shenyang, China.
